column5: OK... so at GREAT UNIMAGINABLE danger to myself and family, I did actually manage to get a camera into the theater...  after taking the train to Istanbul and uploading to the net via satellite link before Interpol cut off the transmission.. I am able to present to you in all its grainy bootleg glory, the first intro to Dave's Show...  a OFC exclusive... I think.  http://www.ontariofishingreels.com/mercer.mpg  Have a look fast... I gotta go...  THE CRTC/CSIS/CIA/RCMP is at the door!!!!!
not workin T.J. Wow, that was fast!!
That makes fishing look too much like work. LOL  TJ, when you get into the slammer, don't smile at BUBBA.
I thought those reels were computer controlled to NOT birdsnest! lol  Looking forward to the humour angle that seems to be missing from a lot of shows these days.  Tony

Thanks for sharing that clip TJ....!!!!!!!!    it was a blast getting to see a sneak preview of daves new show,and it great to see you and all the other fellow OFC'ers there at the AMC in whitby...i think daves new show will be a fun show for a change its about time we have a show like that,im glad its here very soon....cant wait till its on MY WFN fishing network....cheers
Ah, yes, that beginning was one of my favorite parts.  That and Dave's giggle  Joey
Oh that was great. I am sure that is going to be a great show and a nice change from most fishing shows
Thanks TJ....that intro had me laughing right from the start.
i don't have WFN  but then again, i guess its a good thing, or else i wouldn't be able to get off the tv!
From what I understand, perhaps "In Taberna"  would have been a more telling choice.
